cookingTips: Spiral the bacon around the tenderloin and secure with toothpicks to keep it in place
Cook to an internal temperature of 145°F for perfectly tender, juicy pork
Apply barbecue sauce during the last 10 minutes of cooking to prevent burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I wrap bacon around the tenderloin evenly and keep it from burning while the pork cooks?
